div.div: If you would like to attend KMS and need to register, call 264-1411 or stop by the KMS Elementary School office in Murdock or KMS High School office in Kerkhoven.

KMS has Surplus Items for sale
Click on the SURPLUS ITEMS line in the left column. Items are for sale by bids. Details are listed by individual items.

div.div:
October 29 PSAT 8th Grade
October 30 ASVAB 11th Grade
October 31 Pre-Act 10th Grade
January 27 ACCESS and Alternate ACCESS for ELLs® begins
March 2
MCA Reading grades 3–8 and 10 and Mathematics grades 3–8 and 11 begins
MCA Science grades 5, 8, and high school begins
MTAS Reading, Mathematics, and Science begins
March 20
ACCESS and Alternate ACCESS for ELLs® ends
March 24 ACT testing
May 1
MCA Reading grades 3–8 and 10 and Mathematics grades 3–8 and 11 ends
MTAS Reading, Mathematics, and Science
May 8
MCA Science grades 5, 8, and high school ends
